oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New Organization Starts
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Other Unions, Union Organization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: CIO organizers distributing organizing literature to workers. Second Panel: Established union leader reading about the CIO organization drive. Third Panel: Worker with "Organize the Unorganized" banner.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
